data.title: Harold Minnich
data.meta_description: Harold 'Hal' Minnich, the beloved husband, father and friend, who cut the hair of thousands at his shop on one of Elyria's busiest intersections, has passed away at the age of 88. Hal died peacefully surrounded by family Thursday, October 5, 2023.
